item.title: Attacker Ghost Stories - ShmooCon 2014
item.description: Attacker Ghost Stories - ShmooCon 2014 from Rob Fuller

item.title: Blocking Java Exploits, Malicious Signed Applets, and 0days
item.description: The following has been a concept for me for a long time and recently I tweeted the idea which really put me under the fire to prove it. (re: justanidea hashtag) And a few people came up with some very valid points: 1) Doesn’t work so well with HTTPS sites He’s right, but that forces the attack to use SSL, and doing so can yield the defender more information about the attacker, and offer other avenues of defense.
